scripts.dev:server: npm run build && npm run dev -w @maze-runner/backend
scripts.build: npm run build -w @maze-runner/lib && npm run build -w @maze-runner/frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy -w @maze-runner/backend
scripts.test: npm run build -w @maze-runner/lib && npm run test -w @maze-runner/frontend
scripts.test:watch: npm run build -w @maze-runner/lib && npm run test:watch -w @maze-runner/frontend
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:vitest && npm run test:e2e:playwright
scripts.test:e2e:reset-db: wrangler d1 execute maze-runner-db --local --command="DELETE FROM rankings; DELETE FROM sqlite_sequence WHERE name='rankings';" --config backend/wrangler.jsonc
